title: MACHI KORO With Everyone
description:
MACHI KORO With Everyone is a digital board game that combines the classic analog board game Machi Koro, which was nominated for the Spiel des Jahres (German Game of the Year) in 2015 and has sold over a million copies worldwide, with its sister game Machi Koro2 into one package. Butanooo! Simulator
It can be played offline or online with up to 4 people, allowing you to enjoy the game not just with friends and family, but with players from all over the world.
ðŸŽ²Various Ways to Play! Single & Multiplayer You can play with up to 4 people, both online and offline.
* Each player needs to prepare their own hardware and software. * Cross-platform play is not supported.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
